name: Swarm of Esteron
movement: swim 30 ft., fly 30 ft., walk 10 ft.
description: The Swarm of Esteron is a Medium-sized, agile beast that can swim and fly. It has a notable keen sense of smell and the unique ability to occupy the same space as another creature.
memorable: Its swarm nature allows it to engage multiple foes at once, and it cannot regain hit points, creating tension as it weakens in battle.
goals: To attack unarmored foes and overwhelm them with numbers.
relations: It may be related to or encountered with other swarming creatures or amphibious beasts.
environment: Typically found in wetlands or near water bodies.
strengths: Resistant to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage; immune to several conditions.
weaknesses: Cannot regain hit points or gain temporary hit points, becoming weaker as it loses health.
attacks: Bite attack that deals significant piercing damage, diminishing as the swarm's health decreases.
most_powerful_ability: Amphibious ability allows it to thrive in diverse environments.
senses: Possesses keen smell, granting advantage on perception checks related to smell.
additional_information: Can occupy another creature's space and vice versa
Has a high Dexterity modifier for better evasion
Excellent at engaging multiple foes simultaneously
May be encountered in large groups due to its swarm nature
While lacking strategic intelligence, it compensates with numbers and mobility
test_queries: swarm of mobile water and air creatures
beast that can breathe both air and water
agile swarm that attacks with piercing bites
resilient swarm that can't regain health
keen smell beast that occupies other spaces
